column4: Good overview video. Please add this into week 2  with a link to the design file and make a few notes on your thoughts.
Your video is really succinct but in the future add a few more descriptions on how the tools are working. Even if it is voice-over.

column1: MANIPULATES THE HANDLES TO REFINE PATH
USES THE RIGHT TERMINOLOGY IN REFLECTIONS
DOCUMENTS &  SHOWS HOW THE TOOLS  WORK
EXTRA EFFORT - DEMONSTRATES A TOOL NOT MENTIONED
INCLUDES LINK TO FINAL DESIGN FILE
